housing_status.evidence: Agent asked about renting vs owning. Client said they rent.

housing.evidence: Agent asked about rent amount. Customer provided $1,800/month.

housing_insurance.evidence: Agent did not ask about housing insurance or renters insurance.

utilities.evidence: Agent asked about utilities. Client said about $150/month.

phone_internet_tv.evidence: Agent did not ask about phone, internet, or TV expenses.

car_payment.evidence: Agent asked about vehicle payments. Customer said none.

car_insurance.evidence: Agent did not ask about car insurance.

car_fuel.evidence: Agent did not ask about fuel or gas costs.

food_and_groceries.evidence: Client mentioned spending about $300 on groceries during budget discussion.

medical.evidence: Agent did not ask about medical expenses.

health_and_life_insurance.evidence: Agent asked about insurance. Client said $200/month for health insurance.

personal_care.evidence: Personal care expenses were not discussed.

student_loans.evidence: Agent asked about student loans. Client said $250/month.

alimony_and_child_support.evidence: Alimony and child support were not discussed.

other_debts.evidence: Agent did not ask about other debts or expenses beyond the credit report.

violation_reason: Agent skipped 5 of 11 required budget input fields (housing_insurance, phone_internet_tv, car_insurance, car_fuel, medical), failing to collect a complete financial picture.
key_evidence_quote: Agent moved directly from car payment to program presentation without collecting insurance, fuel, phone, or medical expenses.
